name: Saudi Arabia
fact: Saudi Arabia is home to Mecca and Medina, the two holiest cities in Islam.

name: Brazil
fact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest rainforest on Earth.

name: Canada
fact: Canada has more lakes than the rest of the world's countries combined.

name: Egypt
fact: Egypt is home to the Great Pyramid of Giza, the only surviving ancient wonder.

name: Australia
fact: Australia has more kangaroos than people.

name: India
fact: India is the birthplace of both chess and yoga.

name: France
fact: France is the most visited country in the world.

name: South Africa
fact: South Africa is the only country with three capitals.

name: China
fact: China’s Great Wall stretches over 21,000 km.

name: Italy
fact: Rome’s Colosseum could hold around 50,000 spectators in ancient times.

name: Japan
fact: Japan has the world's oldest company, Kongo Gumi, founded in 578 AD.
